mod.name: The Spell Scribe
mod.description:
The Spell Scribe: An attempt to create a character that uses modular spells as a core concept.

Use Spell Effects and Spell Modifiers to create modular spells. 

 Feedback is appreciated.

relics.name: Permafrost Pen
relics.description: Whenever you play a card that gives a scribe:Spell_Effect, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: An ice cold writing instrument, adorned with a snowflake. Its chill numbs the nerves to pain.

relics.name: Alchemical Alter
relics.description: Whenever you would gain scribe:Spell_Effect: Damage, gain half of it as Spell Effect: Poison.
relics.flavorText: A flask of poison, supercharged with electricity. The potency of the toxin will shock you.

relics.name: Runic Repeater
relics.description: Gaining a scribe:Spell_Modifier causes a random card in your hand to cost 1 less until end of turn.
relics.flavorText: A small metallic loop, adorned with strange letters. Wearing it seems to deepen your capacity for magic.

relics.name: Invisible Inkwell
relics.description: Gain "#ySpell Effect: Gain 2 [E]" at the start of each turn. At the end of each turn, lose all scribe:Spell_Effects and scribe:Spell_Modifiers.
relics.flavorText: An ornate Inkwell that spills forth an endless torrent of nothing. You quickly lose track of spells scribed with this "ink".

relics.name: Meditation Circle
relics.description: At the start of your turn, gain 25% scribe:Spell_Effectiveness. Then, if you have less than or equal to 50% Spell Effectiveness, gain an scribe:Additional_Cast this turn.
relics.flavorText: This makes you wonder: Is a circle technically a polygon of infinite sides?
